inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed anaplastic astrocytoma on the tentorium at first relapse
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: unequivocal evidence of tumor recurrence or aggravation by MRI scan after treatment for initial onset
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: anaplastic astrocytoma diagnosed histologically by the last pathological diagnostic tests prior to initial administration of temozolomide
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: tissue samples available for Central Pathologic Reviewer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: MRI scan performed within 14 days before initial temozolomide administration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: assessable tumor site confirmed by MRI
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Age >=18 years, either sex, inpatients or outpatients
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Use of medically approved contraception methods in fertile subjects
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Adequate clinically laboratory values obtained within 14 days before initial temozolomide administration
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who received chemotherapy within 6 weeks before initial temozolomide administration
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who received interstitial radiotherapy or stereotactic radiosurgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who completed radiotherapy within 12 weeks before initial temozolomide administration
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Surgery at first relapse (including biopsy) within 1 week before initial temozolomide administration
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects not recovered from acute toxicity due to previous therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 45-year-old man with a history of anaplastic astrocytoma, severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention
